document_data.name: Negative Energy Protection
document_data.mainbody: '''''Negative energy protection''''' was a [[spell]] that protected against negative energy attacks.
document_data.Effects: When cast, this spell granted immunity to all negative energy based attacks to a targeted creature.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components.
document_data.Other Uses: This spell was used in the [[item enchantment|enchantment]] of [[armor]] with the ''[[Negative energy protection (armor quality)|negative energy protection]]'' [[armor quality]].
